title: fix: db error message, anyhow error
feat: redis redundancy
body:
- Restructure of the redis cluster to 3 MASTER and 3 REPLICA Nodes
- Server should be able to handle an outtage of 3 Nodes with this setup
- This needs testing in order to find whether the switch overs work
- The rust backend might need some changes for reconnects etc.

title: fix: message wrapping for long messages
body: Absolutes Skill Issue... Scrolling funktioniert weiterhin ohne Probleme - entgegen aller Erwartungen Dachte die Formatierung ist kacke, weil ich immer als nachricht Zeichen gespammt hat und dann ein Zeilenumbruch direkt nach Client: enforct wurde (beim letzten Leerzeichen). Bei normalen Nachrichten funktioniert es wie man es erwartet...

title: Feat/db connection
body:
- database integration
- simple orm for database tables
- some simple queries

title: Feat/redis clustering
body:
- Redis is now in cluster mode
- Every node is a copy of each other
- For development purposes the Backend is now capable of using the redis-cluster from the host machine and inside of the container

title: Fix/client redis merge
body:
Fix cargo.lock issue
Fix not refreshing tui-client
Fix messages displayed 2 times

title: Feat/redis cluster
body:
- the message is echoing -> will treated in the future
- only one redis instance is used right now
- in order to test this PR start two servers with different ports each an connect one client to each server and send a message
the message should be transmitted to the other client, which is connected to a different backend than the sender.
- make sure to start redis before testing ;)
